title: sEvakam sheyya
sahitya:
sEvakam sheyyak-kAttirukkirEn siddhamAgavE paramA ni


anupallavi

  bhUvinil vErevar aDimaiyum purindiDAdun pUn-tiruvaDi


caraNam    sAkkup-pOkku sholliDAdu tAkkaDittu malliDAdu 
ukkamaAga unadu paNiyaik-kAkka kAN karuNaik-kaDalE 
kAshu paNangaL kETkavillai kanjikkum oru tollaiyillai
Asi pOdum anbu pOdum ayyanE nin arumai pOdum
